dependencies.description:
PBR is a library that injects some useful and sensible default behaviors
into your setuptools run.
dependencies.name: py-pbr

dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description: Manage Dynamic Plugins for Python Applications.
dependencies.name: py-stevedore

dependencies.description: virtualenv is a tool to create isolated Python environments.
dependencies.name: py-virtualenv

dependencies.description: A script for cloning a non-relocatable virtualenv.
dependencies.name: py-virtualenv-clone

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

description:
virtualenvwrapper is a set of extensions to Ian Bicking's virtualenv
tool. The extensions include wrappers for creating and deleting virtual
environments and otherwise managing your development workflow, making it
easier to work on more than one project at a time without introducing
conflicts in their dependencies.
name: py-virtualenvwrapper

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
